price: (1) The revelation of the Book [i.e., the Qur’ān] is from Allāh, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
